duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepares Market Ready apartments, including painting, carpet repairs, cleaning, general repairs, housekeeping duties, and any necessary duties for a quality move-in experience for residents.

Responds to resident requests in a timely and professional manner, with knowledge of maintenance functions such as plumbing, HVAC, basic electric, general carpentry skills, painting, and snow removal.
Maintains grounds, pools/hot tubs, common areas, and dog park amenities to keep clean, operational, and safe for residents.
Reports any maintenance concerns on vacant units, models, and common areas to the Maintenance Supervisor, and performs scheduled maintenance as required.
Attends training programs as required, delivers superior customer service, maintains company tools and equipment, and complies with safety policies and procedures.
Dresses per company appearance standards, maintains and safeguards company tools and equipment, and performs any other related duties as assigned.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma, GED, Trade, Technical, or Vocational school
